Meet Henry A Perkins, a mild mannered C.P.A. who accidently picks up the wrong briefcase and finds it full of money. Assuming that it is illicit, Henry decides to keep the money and move with his confused wife to Barcelona. They wait for a cab and the doorbell rings. Henryâ€™s attempts to extricate himself from the charges brought against him by two detectives lead to increasing hysterical situations.
